data.name: CannotChangeAutoThresholdWhenCompatibilityIsEnabled
data.value: The AutoCollapseThreshold properties cannot be changed when the Ribbon is visible and Office2007UICompatibility is enabled.

data.name: RibbonCannotBeShownInContainer
data.value: The Ribbon cannot be made visible while Office2007UICompatibility is enabled and the DockWithinContainer of the UltraToolbarsManager is not a top level form.

data.name: DockWithinContainerNotTopLevelForm
data.value: The DockWithinContainer can only be set to a top level form when the Ribbon is visible and Office2007UICompatibility is enabled.

data.name: CannotEnableCompatibilityWhenNotOnTopLevelForm
data.value: Office2007UICompatibility cannot be enabled unless the DockWithinContainer is set to a top level form.

data.name: ChangeChangeStyleWhenCompatibilityIsEnabled
data.value: The 'Style' property cannot be changed while using the Ribbon and Office2007UICompatibility is enabled.

data.name: ChangeUseCustomizeWhenCompatibilityIsEnabled
data.value: The CustomizeDialog cannot be used when the Ribbon is being used and Office2007UICompatibility is enabled.

data.name: ChangeHideQatWhenCompatibilityIsEnabled
data.value: The QuickAccessToolbar cannot be hidden when the Ribbon is being used and Office2007UICompatibility is enabled.

data.name: ChangeHideAppMenuWhenCompatibilityIsEnabled
data.value: The ApplicationMenu cannot be hidden when the Ribbon is being used and Office2007UICompatibility is enabled.
